detail_desc: Short-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a lace yoke and sleeves.

Shirt in patterned premium cotton with a narrow turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

ANNA GLOVER x H&M. Top in patterned jersey with a small stand-up collar, V-neck with pleats at the front and gathered yoke at the back. Decorative gathers at the shoulders and long balloon sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Metal hoop earrings with a round, embossed pendant. Diameter approx. 4 cm.
Top in a crêpe weave with a V-neck front and back and narrow, double shoulder straps that cross at the back. Lined.
Dog jumper in a soft knit with a polo neck, ribbing around the front legs and an opening for the back legs.
Blouse in a cotton weave with a round neckline and gathered yoke front and back. Buttons down the front and long sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with a lined gusset.

KAROLINA KIJAK x H&M. Bomber jacket in patterned satin with a zip down the front, long raglan sleeves and welt side pockets. Small, ribbed stand-up collar with a glittery edge, and the same ribbing with a glittery edge at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Set with a top and joggers in sweatshirt fabric. Round-necked top with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Joggers with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless, straight-cut top in an airy jacquard weave with a V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and covered buttons at the front.
Patterned swim shorts with elastication and ties at the waist and a fly with a hook and loop fastening. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Padded gilet with a detachable, lined hood, zip down the front and side pockets. Lined.

Fitted sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details and long sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs. The top is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with lacing down the back, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Short dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, short, wide sleeves and a gathered yoke at the back. Concealed zip in one side, seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Trainers in mesh with imitation leather details, a lightly padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Straight-cut pleated top in jersey with a slight sheen with narrow shoulder straps.

Fully lined shaping swimsuit that has a sculpting effect on the tummy, back and bum. Wrapover top, lightly padded cups, support panels, decorative gathers in the sides, and adjustable shoulder straps.
Straight-cut jacket in a textured weave containing glittery threads with a collar, welt front pockets, a slit at the cuffs and a single back vent. No fastenings. Lined.
Fabric cap with a motif. Adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Treggings in stretch cotton corduroy with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Patterned bow tie with a matching handkerchief. Bow tie with an adjustable strap and fastening at the back. Width 11 cm. Size of handkerchief 33x33 cm.
Set with a long-sleeved dress and pair of leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey. Dress with a round neckline and gathered seam at the top. Leggings with covered elastication at the waist.
V-neck body in glossy jersey with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back, a seam under the bust and press-studs at the crotch.
Knee-length, fitted dress in sturdy jersey with a V-neck, wide shoulder straps that cross at the back and a short slit at the back.
Dress in a soft, checked cotton weave with a lace-trimmed collar and buttons at the top. Short, lace-trimmed sleeves, a gathered seam at the waist and patch front pockets with lace details. Unlined.
Jumper in a loose knit containing some mohair and wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Imitation leather sandals with straps at the front and elastication at the back of the heel. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 6 cm.
Imitation leather trainers with a padded tongue and edge, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave. Regular waist with elastication at the back, fake back pockets and slim legs with creases.
Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets and tapered legs with creases.

Long parka in a cotton weave with a high stand-up collar with press-studs and a drawstring hood. Zip and wind-flap with concealed press-studs, dropped shoulders, sleeves with press-studs at the cuffs, flap front pockets with concealed press-studs and a single back vent. Unlined.
Espadrilles in imitation suede with a braided jute trim around the soles and a braided cord at the back that can be wound around the ankle. Thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Ankle-length trousers in an airy linen blend with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Crop tops in soft jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and narrow elastication at the hem.

Lined, non-wired, triangle bikini top with a wide hem. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that can be fastened in different ways at the back and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners.

Wide shirt in sturdy, organic cotton denim with a collar, press-studs down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and a fake welt back pocket with a button.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a narrow ribbed trim around the neckline. Press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Short skirt in a sturdy weave with pleats and narrow, contrasting colour trims at the hem. Press-stud and concealed zip at one side. Unlined.
Top in patterned sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long balloon sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and gently tapered legs with good room for movement over the thighs and knees.
Espadrilles with a braided jute trim around the sole. Cotton twill linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high waist with pleats at the front of the waistband, a zip fly and hook-and-eye fasteners. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight, wide legs.
Socks in fine-knit nylon containing glittery threads.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a text motif, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline and a drawstring at the hem. Soft brushed inside.

Set with a glittery tulle skirt and a pair of bat wings with a glitter print. Skirt with an elasticated waist and asymmetric hem. Wings with a metal rim and elastic shoulder straps. Size approx. 22x39 cm.
Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a small frilled collar with ties and a V-neck. Raglan sleeves with smocking and a frill at the cuffs.

Calf-length dress in a cotton and viscose weave with embroidery and inset lace trims. Scalloped V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, seam with a lace trim at the waist and a concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Blouse in a crinkled weave with a sheen. Small, frill-trimmed stand-up collar and a smocked yoke. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with smocking at the cuffs, and covered elastication at the hem.
Jumper in soft, jacquard-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Court shoes with pointed toes and covered heels. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 9.5 cm.
Long-sleeved dress in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a round neckline, pattern-knit sections, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Pyjamas in printed cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Fully lined triangle bikini top with removable inserts, a knot detail at the front and ties at the back of the neck. Metal fastener at the back.
Thin metal chain necklaces in various designs with a pendant. One necklace has two chains. Adjustable length 40-47 cm and 51-58 cm.
Short cycling shorts in stretch jersey with a sheen. High waist with covered elastication.
Sandals with covered platform soles and heels, straps across the foot and an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Platform 2 cm, heel 11 cm.
LIMITED EDITION. Straight-cut blouse in soft, airy silk with a sheen. V-neck with a pleat at the front, long dolman sleeves and wide, close-fitting cuffs with covered buttons.
Wide, high-waisted trousers in a soft, printed weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Pockets in the side seams and straight-cut legs with creases.
Trousers in woven fabric. High waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt, a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and a zip fly. Side pockets and tapered legs with creases.
5-pocket, low-rise shorts in washed denim with worn details. Coin pocket and back pockets with a flap and press-stud, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Suit trousers in marled Italian wool with stitching details. Concealed button and hook-and-eye fastening, zip fly, side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button, and legs with creases. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Boxy off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft chenille knit with a wide, foldover top, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved cardigan in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with raw edges. Jersey-lined hood and patch front pockets. No fasteners.
Hat in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a ribbed hem.
Short shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, and side pockets.
Sleeveless tops in a soft viscose weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and a seam and flounce at the hem.
Short, fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with a low neckline at the front, visible zip at the top and long sleeves.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton and recycled polyester blend with a soft brushed inside. Covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Fully lined shaping swimsuit that has a sculpting effect on the tummy, back and bum. Frill-trimmed wrapover top, lightly padded cups, decorative gathers in the sides, and adjustable shoulder straps.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined, drawstring, wrapover hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Ankle-length trousers in twill made from a cotton and linen blend. High waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt, fly with visible buttons, welt side pockets and straight-cut legs that taper to the hem.
Suit trousers in a patterned weave with a regular waist, concealed fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs with turn-ups at the hems.
Hat in a soft rib knit with an appliqué on the turned-up edge.
Soft suede slippers with elastication at the top and lacing at the front. Imitation suede linings and insoles.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with elasticated ribbing at the waist, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a print motif.
